text: Barre Sangarsh Samuha ( "Barre Struggle Group") was a communist faction in Barre, Nepal. The group emerged in the early 1980s, after breaking off from the Communist Party of Nepal (Pushpa Lal). It subsequently merged into the Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist). ==Sources== *Rawal, Bhim Bahadur. Nepalma samyabadi andolan: udbhab ra vikas. Kathmandu: Pairavi Prakashan. Chart nr. 1. Category:Defunct communist parties in Nepal
title: Barre Sangarsh Samuha
